thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com | 44 of 3060
thread.title: Fred Gouws

author: Fred Gouws
title: Fred Gouws
text: Great service and support from Rentalcars.com (UK). I received a notice that I will be billed for damages to the rental car i recently used in South Africa. I had the car insured with Rentalcars.com hence the full amount was paid back into my credit card in no time. I have used rentalcars extensively in the past 5 years and this quick solution to my problem will have me going back to them. Great work and support.
